body: And now we've moved on to not even tagging the groups and artists to pass by blacklists! What's the point of tags if you don't tag them! Tagger is trash and I hope they get removed from tagging (They know this artist/group was likely blacklisted along with NTR, but know the characters and parody weren't! Seriously don't get the mind set, I think they just WANT a war between NTR and NTR haters to happen in a vain attempt of trying to tempt people to like NTR by hiding the tags! Disgusting)
